titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the deportation of aliens who associate with known terrorists.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 10/5/1998--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the deportation of an alien who associates with an individual such alien knows or has reason to believe is designated as a terrorist by a certain State Department publication.
